document_data.mainbody:
Jari was one of the hunters from the Wandering Village who traveled Icewind Dale between the Ten Towns and Kuldahar on the Spine of the World in the early 14 century DR.
Circa the , Jari sought to impress his beloved Anjas father. The beautiful woman had numerous suitors, and her father thought that the men needed to compete for Anjas hand. Jari thought that if he failed to impress his beloveds parent, the couple would have to run away from the Wandering Village together, which was a likely outcome of the competition. Jari was not a good hunter, and in desperation, he thought of entering the deadly Fell Wood to try and kill one of the great white winter wolves tho laired there.
